name: Dog Shock Collar with Remote - 3300Ft New Upgraded Dog Training Collar with 5 Modes, IPX7 Waterproof Remote Training Collar for Small Medium Large Dogs, Flashlight & Reflective Strap for Night Safety
short_description: 【 𝐍𝐞𝐰 𝐔𝐩𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐝𝐞𝐝 𝟓 𝐈𝐧 𝟏 𝐃𝐨𝐠 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐂𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐚𝐫 】Our New Updated Shock Collar offer 5 safe & humane operation modes: Beep (9 Tone Types), Vibration (1-16 levels), Static (1-99 levels), No Static Mode(Level 16) and Flashlight. With a wide range of stimulation levels, help you choose a proper level for your puppies and solve the problem of inappropriate dog behavior safely and effectively!

【 𝐍𝐨 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐜 𝐋𝐨𝐜𝐤 & 𝐒𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐋𝐨𝐜𝐤 】Our Bark Shock Collar has a No Static Mode.When this mode is triggered, the static mode of ecollar will switch to the 16th level of sound and vibration, which is suitable for training little or more sensitive doggies. And the instant response Security On/Off Lock also ensures safe usage without fear of accidental touch!

【 𝟑𝟑𝟎𝟎𝐅𝐓 𝐋𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐑𝐚𝐧𝐠𝐞 & 𝟑 𝐃𝐨𝐠 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐥 】Peture Electric Dog Collar training range is up to 3300ft, supports remote control of 1-3 Dogs at the same time for instant training, making it easy to enjoy training time with your dog in the backyard, park, forest, wilderness, beach or anywhere else! From now on, no more shouting to have a good puppy!

【 𝐄𝐱𝐭𝐫𝐚-𝐋𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐋𝐢𝐟𝐞】The Shock Collar With Remote offers a Long-Lasting Battery Life and a convenient 2-in-1 Quick Charging Cable. It only takes 2 Hours to fully charge, providing up to 40 Days of standby time for the receiver and 180 Days for the remote, making outdoor walks and playtime even more enjoyable!

【 𝐈𝐏𝟔𝟕 𝐖𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐨𝐟 & 𝐅𝐢𝐭 𝐀𝐥𝐥 𝐒𝐢𝐳𝐞𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐃𝐨𝐠𝐬 】Our Puppy Training Collar is IP67 waterproof, making your puppy easy to enjoy showering, swimming, and river-trekking freely! The Reflective nylon strap can be adjusted to fit dogs weighing between 5 - 120 lbs with neck sizes from 6 - 24 inches, suitable for all kinds of dogs!

name: Bousnic Dog Shock Collar for 2 Dogs - (8-120lbs) Waterproof Rechargeable Electric Dog Training Collar with Remote for Small Medium Large Dogs with Beep Vibration Safe Shock Modes(Grey)
short_description: Perfect for Training, Simple and Effective: Our electric shock collar is designed with 3 extremely effective harmless modes: beep(standard), vibration(standard), safe shock(adjustable 1-16 levels), which can help you train your dog to behave well

Dual-Channel with Up to Almost 1000FT Range: Our remote features a dual-channel to support training 2 dogs simultaneously. The remote training range of this e collar is almost 1000FT, which makes sure you can enjoy the training time with your dog in the backyard, the park, at the beach, or anywhere else

Sleeker, Smaller and More Lightweight, Comfortable for All Sizes of Dogs: This our e collar Receiver is mini. Meas.2.3(L)*1.4(W)*1(H)inch. Weigh only 0.12Lbs. Thin and lightweight. The Bousnic adjustable nylon collar fits 6-27 inches.The training collar is very comfortable for small medium large dogs (8lbs -120lbs). The remote is ergonomic designed. Silicone covered, it is easy to hold and operate

Rechargeable and IPX7 Waterproof: Our electronic collar is rechargeable with a built-in lithium battery. You can charge the shock collar with your phone adapter, which is very convenient. The collar receiver is IPX7 waterproof, offering you maximum flexibility during the outdoor activities

Long-lasting Battery Life: Our e collar uses the latest lithium battery technology providing battery life that lasts for a longer time. Besides, it takes only 2-3 hours to be fully charged. For the initial charge, be sure to charged it for 4 hours. Typically used, the receiver will last for 11-15 days, while the remote battery will last for over 1 month

When the collar is properly fitted, you should be able to put 2 fingers in between the collar and the dog’s neck. If you have to cut some part of the strap off, please do immediately singe the collar end with a lighter to avoid fraying.</br> </br> The remote is not waterproof. Please keep it away from water.

name: Ultra Small Shock Collar for Small Dogs, Dog Training Collar with Remote for Small & Medium Dogs 5-30lbs, Waterproof, Rechargeable, 1300ft Range, Collar with Beep, Vibration, Safe Shock
short_description: FeatherLight Comfort Focus - Designed specifically for little dogs with 6-19 inch neck sizes. Ultra-light build and breathable woven strap prevent rubbing during extended wear.

26-Level Precision Training - This shock collar for dogs delivers customizable corrections: 0-9 beep tones, 0-9 vibration patterns, and 0-9 static pulses. One-touch switching adapts instantly to training needs.
Month-Long Wireless Freedom - Ultra-efficient battery provides 30 days of typical use per charge. Waterproof snap-on charging maintains full protection.
Professional Safety Features - Removable contact points and gentle stimulation make this Small Dog Shock Collar ideal for 5-30lb dogs and puppies. Trainer-approved for humane effectiveness.
Uninterrupted 1300FT Control - Maintains strong signal through obstacles with zero dropouts. Waterproof construction withstands rain and splashes during outdoor use.

name: Jugbow Dog Shock Collar - 4200FT Dog Training Collar with Remote Innovative IPX7 Waterproof with 4 Training Modes, Rechargeable E-Collar for All Breeds
short_description: 【4 Humanized, Effective, Safe Training Modes】Our dog shock collar features 4 humane training modes: beep(1-8 levels), vibration(1-16 levels), safe shock(1-99 levels) and Shock Boost(10% higher). Enables you to set the right stimulation levels for your pet, which is helpful in deterring dogs from undesirable habits.

【4200FT Range & 2 Channel】The dog training collar covers up to 4200FT allowing the dog to roam farther, making it easy to train your dog indoors or outdoors. With dual-channel, one remote supports 2 receiver collars, and you can train 2 dogs at the same time! Besides, it has a memory function without resetting it.

【Fits for All Sizes of Dogs】Jugbow training collar for dogs sizes dog with neck sizes from 7.8 - 24.4 inches and weights from 10 - 120 lbs. Dog training collars are suitable for large dogs, medium dogs, and small dogs. This collar strap is made of soft nylon to protect your dog comfortably. Meanwhile, the lightweight collar design reduces your dog's burden.

【IPX7 Waterproof Collar & Security Lock】The electric dog collar can be used in any weather and any condition thanks to the IPX7 waterproof design of the receiver. Instant response security on/off switch button allows you to carry it without any fear of accidental touch.

【Incredible Battery Life & Quick Charging】 Charging via USB, 2-in-1 fast charging only 2 hours to be fully charged. This dog training collar with remote provides battery life that lasts for a long time, the e collar can last up to 35 days of standby time and the remote 45 days!

name: Jugbow Dog Shock Collar - 4200FT Dog Training Collar with Remote, IPX7 Waterproof Electric Collar with 4 Training Modes, Security Lock, Rechargeable e-Collar for Dogs 10-120lbs
short_description: [4 Training Modes, Perfect Training Control] Gain effective and adjustable aid for your training sessions. With 4 training modes - beep(standard), vibration(1-9 levels), safe shock(1-99 levels) and Shock Boost(10% higher)—you have the precise tool for every situation, from stopping backyard barking to ending leash-pulling during walks. This tailored control helps you build better habits, resulting in a happier, more obedient dog.

[Extended 4200FT Range, Ultimate Off-Leash Freedom] Imagine your dog roaming freely at the park while you maintain reliable guidance from a distance. With a strong 4200ft range, this dog shock collar is perfect for recall training and safe off-leash adventures. The single remote even manages 2 dogs simultaneously with individual memory settings—ideal for households with multiple pets.

[Fits Most Dogs in Your Family] From spirited small breeds to energetic large dogs, this adjustable e collar comfortably fits neck sizes from 7.8" to 24.4" and dogs weighing 10-120 lbs, ideal for daily obedience training, outdoor play, or structured sessions at home. For your dog's well-being, we recommend limiting wear to 12 hours a day, giving them plenty of cozy, collar-free rest.

[IPX7 Waterproof Collar] Let your dog be a dog, no matter the weather or mess. The training collar's IPX7 waterproof rating laughs at rain, mud, puddles, and surprise swims. Whether you're hiking through a downpour or playing fetch at the beach, this shock collar stays fully functional. No more worrying about water damage—just dependable training, wherever life takes you.

[Upgraded Battery, Safety First] Enjoy days of training without constant recharging. The ecollar offers up to 35 days of standby, and the remote 45 days. When it’s finally time to power up, a quick 2-hour charge gets you back in action fast. And with the one-touch Safe-Lock, you can instantly lock the controls to prevent any accidental activation. Train with greater peace of mind and safety.

name: Joytale Martingale Collar for Dogs, Reflective Heavy Duty for Safety, Quick Release Buckle, Adjustable Nylon Collars for Medium Dogs Walking Training, Hotpink,M
short_description: EASY TO USE: Our martingale collar is designed to gently tighten when your dog pulls, preventing them from choking or escaping. The quick release buckle can be quickly opened in case of an emergency, ensuring your dog's safety
ADJUSTABLE FIT: The martingale collar has an adjustable buckle to ensure a snug fit for your dog. It is available in different sizes to fit dogs with a neck size of 10.5-25 inches
DURABLE MATERIAL: Made from high-quality nylon materials, this collar is built to withstand daily wear and tear
REFLECTIVE MATERIAL: The reflective elements on the collar enhance visibility and safety during low-light conditions

PERFECT FOR TRAINING: The martingale collar is an effective tool for training dogs. It helps to correct bad behavior such as pulling, barking, and jumping. It is gentle on your dog's neck and does not cause any discomfort

name: 2-in-1 AI Anti-misoperation Smart Dog Bark Collar, Dog Training Collar with 3300FT Remote, IPX7 Waterproof Automatic Anti-Barking Device for 1 Dog with Beep, Vibration, Safe Shock Modes
short_description: 【LED Indicator Light】 In low-light environments, you can locate your dog by turning on the light to prevent it from getting lost. Additionally, the length of the collar can be freely cut according to the dog's size. The collar is designed with a reflective strip, which makes it easier for drivers to spot the dog at night, better protecting the dog's safety

【Sound, Vibration, Static Modes】 The dog training device has three modes: - Sound Commands: 1-9 different sounds, and different training commands can be assigned to each sound. - Vibration Mode: 1-16 vibration intensity levels, suitable for small, medium, and large dogs; you can select different intensities based on the dog's behavior. - Static Mode: 1-99 static shock intensity levels. You can gradually adjust to find the appropriate intensity according to the dog's size and tolerance. This provides more options for training and emergency deterrence, ensuring effectiveness

【Ultra-Long-Distance Operation】 The maximum operating distance is 1000 meters / 1100 yds / 3300 Ft. In open areas such as the seaside and countryside, the distance can reach 1000 meters; even in high-density urban building complexes, the operating distance can still reach 500 meters

2-Year warranty with replacement only, no repairs.IPX7 Waterproof. The collar features IPX7 waterproof performance, allowing normal use even in rainy weather, swimming pools, rivers, and the seaside, significantly extending its service life

【Ultra-Long Battery Life】 It uses a high-capacity and high-purity lithium battery. The remote control has a battery life of 180 days, and the collar has a battery life of 25-40 days. Moreover, the battery will not experience significant degradation even with long-term use. It adopts a Type-C charging port, enabling full charging within 2 hours. One USB port can connect two Type-C charging cables to charge the remote control and the receiver (collar) simultaneously, making it convenient and hassle-free

Supports up to three dogs for simultaneous use. A single remote control can connect to up to 3 collars, allowing independent operation of each collar without affecting other dogs. It is a high-quality and cost-effective dog training device

【AI Automatic Anti-barking】 Built with an AI chip that intelligently recognizes dog barks and stores 10,000 bark samples, the collar ensures that only barking sounds activate the automatic bark control mode. Thus, it significantly reduces misinterpretation and false triggers, minimizing unnecessary corrections for your dog

name: Dog Training Collar with Remote - 5 Modes with Step Counter & Smart Color Screen 3300FT Electric Dog Shock Collar IP67 Waterproof Rechargeable E Collar for Large Medium Small Dogs (Blue)
short_description: 【Newest Smart Color Screen & Step Counter】Frayo dog shock collar is the first one in market to incorporate the design concept of smart phone screen, which makes adjusting settings easier. Adopted advanced pedometer technology, the shock collar for dogs can track dog activity and let you know dog's amount of exercise in time

【5 Humanized & Effective & Safe Training Modes】This training collar is designed with 5 humane training modes: beep(1-3 levels), vibration(L-M-H levels), safe shock(0-99 levels), dog light(2 modes) and step counting(4 records), allowing you to set suitable stimulation levels for your pet and helping them form good habits

【3300FT Range & 2 Channel】Covering up to 3300FT, the e collar for dogs training allows the dog to roam farther, so convenient to train dog anywhere! One remote supports 2 receiver collars, so you are able to train simultaneously 2 dogs. Also, it has a memory function without resetting it

【Faster Charge & Longer Standby Time】2-IN-1 charging cable allows you to fully charge the dog collar and remote within 2 hours. With a larger capacity rechargeable battery, this dog training collar with remote can last up to 60 days of standby time. Less time to charge, more time to train

【IP67 Waterproof Collar & Security Lock】Thanks to IP67 waterproof & dustproof design of the receiver, the electric shock collar can be used in any weather or condition (Note: the remote need to keep away from water). Instant response security on/off switch button allows you to carry it no need to worry about accidental touch

【Fits for All Sizes of Dogs】Adjustable dog training collar is perfect for dogs of neck sizes 8 - 25 inches and weight 8 - 150 lbs. Made of soft nylon to protect your dog comfortably and featured by lightweight material to reduce dog's burden, it is ideal for training large dogs, medium dogs, and small dogs

name: 2 in 1 Dog Shock Collar & Ultrasonic Bark Deterrent Device – 3300FT Remote Training E Collar with Beep, Vibration & Safe Shock, IP67 Waterproof & Rechargeable for Small Medium Large Dogs
short_description: [4 Customizable Training Modes – Tailored to Your Dog's Needs] This Dog Shock Collar offers 4 adjustable training modes: Beep (8 levels), Vibration (16 levels), Adjustable Shock (99 levels), and Ultrasonic Sound (3 levels, up to 16 ft). Whether you're teaching basic obedience indoors or stopping excessive barking during outdoor walks, you can adjust the intensity and mode for safe, effective training. Perfect for all dog types, from small to large dogs.

[Up to 3300 ft Control Range – Perfect for Outdoor Adventures] Enjoy full control even in vast outdoor spaces, with a remote range of up to 3300 feet. Whether you're hiking, playing fetch in the park, or letting your dog run free at the beach, this collar ensures you can manage your dog from a distance. Note: The ultrasonic mode works best up to 16 feet—ideal for indoor training or short-range correction in the backyard. It also supports dual-dog control, so you can train two dogs at once.

[IP67 Waterproof – Built for Any Weather Condition] This Dog Shock Collar is IP67 waterproof, making it perfect for all-weather training. Whether your dog loves to splash in puddles, swim in the lake, or you’re training in heavy rain, this collar continues to perform. It’s reliable in extreme conditions like snow, rain, or mud. No need to worry about wet environments—whether it’s hiking, camping, or just playing outdoors, the collar stays effective and ensures continuous training in any weather.

[Long Battery Life – Up to 15 Days of Use] Enjoy up to 15 days of active use and 3 months of standby time on a single charge. This collar is ideal for long hikes, vacations, or daily training sessions without the worry of constant recharging. Perfect for extended outdoor adventures, you can train your dog all day without having to stop for a recharge. Whether you’re on a road trip or enjoying a weekend getaway, the collar remains charged and ready to use whenever you need it.

[User-Friendly – Easy for Everyone to Use] Equipped with a clear LCD display and intuitive buttons, this collar is simple for everyone to operate, from children to seniors. Whether at home, in the park, or on walks, it’s easy to control with just a push of a button. The ergonomic remote fits comfortably in your hand, and the backlit screen ensures visibility in low light. No tech skills needed—train your dog easily and confidently with this user-friendly design.
